europeana:record.dc:title: A generic reclassification of the Afrotropical Bolboceratini (Coleoptera: Geotrupidae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Krikken J.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Coleoptera; Geotrupidae; Bolboceratini; key
genera; Afrotropical; checklists
species
europeana:record.dc:description: The generic classification of the Afrotropical Bolboceratini is discussed. Fourteen genera are recognized, five of them new: Bolboceratellus, Bolbodius, Bolboceratex, Namibiobolbus and Meridiobolbus. Microbolbus Vulcano et al. is synonymized with Mimobolbus Vulcano et al. Bolbaffroides and Bolboceratops are raised to generic rank. The genera are keyed, diagnosed, and their species are listed. Many new combinations are proposed, mainly for species hitherto combined with Bolboceras Kirby.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: A generic reclassification of the Afrotropical Bolboceratini (Coleoptera: Geotrupidae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 58) (Issue 3)
